header_section.title: Buy and sell BNB Indonesia 24 hours
header_section.description: The largest BNB trading platform in Indonesia since 2015. Easy, anytime & anywhere 24 hours without holidays. Triv is integrated with 61 banks & E-money in Indonesia, since 2015 Triv is used by millions of people to transact BNB.

liquiditas.title: High Liquidity
liquiditas.content: Spread or the difference in the buying and selling price of BNB Triv is one of the lowest in the market today. With our brokerage system you do not need to wait for other buyers / sellers to make transactions. All buying / selling transactions can be done instantly and in real-time without a waiting process.

regulator.title: Regulated and Insured
regulator.content: Since 2015 Triv has been used by millions of people, all customer funds in our system are insured by Bitgo and Lloyd England for 100 million USD or the equivalent of 1.45 trillion rupiah. Triv is an authorized broker registered and supervised by Bappebti.

layanan_section.content: Triv app allows you to buy, sell, trade â€“ as well swap and staking â€“ crypto currencies. Triv is the most comprehensive and secure trading platform to manage and develop the value of your portfolio according to the current crypto currencies price.

jual_beli.title: Buy and Sell Binance 24 hours
jual_beli.content: Unlike traditional investment instruments, Triv has no holidays. You can buy and sell your BNB balance in real-time with banks or e-wallets in seconds even on holidays.

kirim.title: Send Binance
kirim.content: Since it is digital, sending Binance can be as easy as sending an email. Crypto also doesn't have any physical borders the way dollars or euros do. We may call it the future currency. Sending Binance is free of charge from a fellow Triv users!

terima.title: Receive Binance
terima.content: You can receive Binance through your Triv account instantly. Since crypto is unlimited financial ecosystem.

hoddl.title: HODL Binance
hoddl.content: The fact is Binance HODLER get higher returns compared with Binance trader. Therefore, HODL your Binance in Triv, in protection under insurance of Bigo & Llyod England up to USD100 million or equivalent to 1.45 trillion Rupiahs.

swap.title: Swap Binance
swap.content: There are 1000+ supported cryptocurrencies in Triv platform and counting. You can enjoy the benefits of the 24/7 crypto staking service in real time.

isi_pulsa.title: Top Up Credit and Pay Bills
isi_pulsa.content: Exchange your BNB coins to Triv rupiah wallet and use it for various purposes such as topping up credit, paying bills and even buying electricity tokens.

live_chat.title: Average LiveChat Responds
live_chat.content: Livechat and Call center support service in Triv, ready to help you 24/7

processing.title: Average Processing Time
processing.content: Automatic and zero-downtime transaction in Triv. Since 2015, Triv run its operation without incurring downtime
